name: NUTRILITE® Sports Nutrition Strength Athlete Fitness Bundle
description:
Peak your performance by making NUTRILITE® Sports Nutrition Bundles a part of your fitness routine before, during, and after your workout. 

If you engage in strength training, working with weights to build muscle mass, then the Strength Athlete Fitness Bundle is right for you. This Strength Athlete Bundle, like the others – Beginner, Active, Cross Training Athlete, and Endurance Athlete – has been designed to meet the unique needs of each type of athlete. 

All products are naturally sweetened and antioxidant infused. 

This NUTRILITE Sports Nutrition Strength Athlete Fitness Bundle was specifically designed for you. Your bundle contains: 

NUTRILITE Sports Nutrition Energy Bars, Chocolate Nut Roll NUTRILITE Whey Protein Bars, Cookies and Cream  
NUTRILITE ROC2O Sports Drink Mix 
NUTRILITE Whey Protein Powder, Vanilla

name: NUTRILITE ENERGY/WHEY PROTEIN BARS & PROTEIN POWDER

The ultimate combination of flavor and performance to help fuel the building and rebuilding of lean muscle mass. 25 grams of protein and a nutritious blend of ingredients and antioxidants help muscles recover and rebuild, while boosting energy stores (or muscle energy) to ensure you are ready for your next workout. FEEL THE ENERGY. KNOW THE POWER.™

ENERGY BARS
Nine 46 g bars 
Recommended use: 1 Use(s) per day

WHEY PROTEIN BARS

WHEY PROTEIN POWDER

name: PHRESH GREENS
description:
When the pH of our bodies gets out of balance and we become too acidic, we have low energy, fatigue, excess weight, irregularity, heart burn, acne and aches & pains. Acidosis of the blood is the prime reason most of our health suffers and always will. Maintaining your pH facilitating your blood/body with more alkaline supplements and or foods (such as pHresh greens) helps provide support for your body

PHRESH GREENS
pHresh Raw Green Superfood
What is pHresh greens®superfood? pHresh greens® is a full spectrum, raw, green superfood blend of energy rich alkalizing vegetables, cereal grasses and sea algae. pHresh greens® is highly bio-available to provide your body with a rich natural source of vitamins, trace minerals, chlorophyll and other phytonutrients beneficial to health. We live in an increasingly toxic environment and consequently it is important to support our bodies with good concentrated vegetable nutrition. A great way to compensate for modern diets and lifestyles is to start your day pHresh with pHresh greens®. It is a great 'greens' product for everyone, whether you want to maintain your health or regain vitality.

pHresh greens® is made with 16 ingredients that were carefully selected for their high pH. It’s made with TRUE INTENTION† ensuring that you will get all the ingredients’ benefits without any harmful chemicals, additives or fillers. Its ingredients have been slow dried under 70°F/21.1°C to help retain its life energy. pHresh greens® is made from the natural produce itself, thus ensuring you are getting the nutrients from each of the ingredients in a natural state, just one step removed from picking the produce from your own garden. pHresh greens® will help deliver optimal nutrition to every cell in your body!

name: PHRESH STRIPS
description:
What is pHresh strips™?

Do you know your pH? Have you been taught how to test it? Just as we test the pH in a pool, fish tank or soil, now you can do it for your body easily and effectively. pHresh strips™ pH test is the solution to determine if your body is in either balanced or an acidic state. pHresh strips™ pH test is based on a two test color system which is more effective than litmus paper and does not bleed while testing either your urine or saliva. pHresh strips™ pH test is the most convenient way to test your pH!*

Accurate Results. pHresh strips™ pH test gives you an extremely precise reading of how acidic or alkaline your body tissues is in .25 pH unit increments, so you’ll know exactly what your pH is.*

Easy to read. Unlike regular litmus pH paper, pHresh strips™ pH test two color system is easy to read with no bleeding.*

Economical. pHresh strips™ pH test is the most convenient, most accurate and easier to read than litmus paper, and they’re surprisingly affordable.*

Narrow range of 4.5 - 9.0*
.25 pH unit increments*
No bleeding, no mess*
Tests Urine or Saliva*
80 strips per package*
Super sensitive and accurate*
Results in only 15 seconds*
Easy and Convenient way to test your pH!*

name: PHRESH SALT
description:
PHRESH SALT
pHresh salt is high-quality, hand-mined Himalayan crystal salt found deep withinn the pristine Himalayan Mountains. Himalayan crystal salt is pure, unrefined, nutritious, and therapeutic salt harvested from ancient sea salt deposits in the Himalayan Mountains. It has been protected and kept pure for over 250 million years. Yes, this salt is 250 million years old!

100% unrefined: pHresh salt is holistic, wholesome and unaltered. It is hand-mined and hand-washed and not exposed to industrial processes or environmental pollutants. It is not bleached, not subject to high temperature that alters the natural chemical structure of the minerals in the salt and does not contain harmful chemicals such as anti-caking agents. 

Pure & natural: This is by far the purest salt available on earth and is absolutely uncontaminated by any toxins or enviornmental pollutants.

Naturally pink: The beautiful color of pHresh salt is due to the presence of the 84 trace minerals in their unrefined form.

Crystal Structure: Crystal salt structure has an array of element forms and a compound in which each molecule is inter-connected. The connectedness allows the vibrational component of the trace elements in the salt to be in harmony with each other and increases the ability to promote a healthy balance.

name: Legacy of Clean™ HOME Bundle (EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO CLEAN AND BE GREEN)
description:
Description
Get to know the real meaning of clean! We’ve taken our top Legacy of Clean environmentally-sensitive laundry and household cleaning products and created this introductory bundle. And, as a bonus, we’re including a FREE Stain Chart. 
The bundle includes: 
33.8 fl. oz. SA8® Triple Liquid Detergent-Floral 
33.8 fl. oz. Fabric Softener-Floral 
32 fl. oz. Pre Wash 
2.2 lbs. TRI-ZYME® Detergent Booster 
3.08 lbs. Dishwasher Detergent 
32 fl. oz. Bathroom Cleaner 
32 fl. oz. Glass Cleaner 
32 fl. oz. Kitchen Cleaner 
16.9 fl. oz. Dish Drops® Dish Liquid-Citrus 
48-count box of All-Purpose Surface Wipes, and a FREE Stain Chart.

name: LEGACY OF CLEAN KITCHEN/LAUNDRY
description:
LAUNDRY
Power away dirt naturally. These concentrated laundry detergents contain a range of targeted enzyme- and plant-based solutions to remove the most stubborn stains, as they soften and brighten clothes. All without harmful phosphates or chlorine. You’ll get three super-effective, PLANET POSITIVE™ laundry products. SA8® Triple Liquid – Floral Scent (3 L, up to 100 wash loads), Fabric Softener – Floral Scent (1 L, up to 50 wash loads), and All Fabric Bleach (2.6 lbs., up to 40 wash loads). 

KITCHEN
LEGACY OF CLEAN provides everything you need for a positively clean kitchen. These products are formulated to handle the messiest jobs without harsh chemicals or harmful residues. You get our powerful LEGACY OF CLEAN surface cleaners: citrus-scented Kitchen Concentrate Surface Cleaner (32-fl. oz.), dual-sided Microfiber Cloths (pack of 3), and L.O.C.® Multi-Purpose Towelettes (96-ct.). For dishes, there's concentrated DISH DROPS® Dish Liquid (33.8-fl. oz.) and SCRUB BUDS® Pads (box of 4). A Pistol Grip Sprayer is also included.
